results.title: One of my WebJobs keeps failing with no exit code 1, but no other errors in log. All the others work fine. - Microsoft Q&A
results.description: Thanks| Hi Piercarlo Serena , Thanks for the below details that would really help other community member, I am attaching it here so that it will be a overall detail regarding the mentioned issue: " Cau... The process was exiting without flushing the transport. Solution : deactivate Pino on production, since it's not even used on the WebJobs.

descriptions.content: Thanks| Hi Piercarlo Serena , Thanks for the below details that would really help other community member, I am attaching it here so that it will be a overall detail regarding the mentioned issue: " Cau... The process was exiting without flushing the transport. Solution : deactivate Pino on production, since it's not even used on the WebJobs.

results.title: New Stuff
results.description: Add a Chat Room to Your Site alcomp Development has released a new version of PINO 3-Server, a TCP/IP-based chat server for Windows. PINO 3-Server lets you define many aspects of the chat experience, including an unlimited number of system rooms. Further security measures include IP-based access control. PINO 3-Server supports you in displaying.

descriptions.content: Add a Chat Room to Your Site alcomp Development has released a new version of PINO 3-Server, a TCP/IP-based chat server for Windows. PINO 3-Server lets you define many aspects of the chat experience, including an unlimited number of system rooms. Further security measures include IP-based access control. PINO 3-Server supports you in displaying.
